con:request.name: create
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_9" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_9" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v7" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v1_7" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v1_7"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>EVRYCPS</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PAY</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PAYSPaymentCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V1_9</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>831509007</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials></wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>4201</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>831509007</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>NO</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>123.123.123.123</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="Agreementid" value="831509007"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="BES"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000)+1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${#TestSuite#endtoendID}</urn2:endToEndIdentification> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>CHK</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority> <urn3:categoryPurpose>SUPP</urn3:categoryPurpose> </urn3:paymentTypeInformation>
<urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${#TestSuite#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate><urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>42010026107</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <urn3:debtor> <urn2:name>Ahmed Selim</urn2:name> </urn3:debtor> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK"> <urn2:amount>1</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <urn4:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn4:chargeBearer> <urn4:creditorAgent> <urn2:bic>DEUTDEMM760</urn2:bic> <urn2:name>demu</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:postCode>10115</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>berlin</urn2:townName> <urn2:country>DE</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <urn2:name>Ahmed Selim</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:postCode>10115</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>Berlin</urn2:townName> <urn2:country>DE</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:instructionForCreditorAgent> <urn2:code>CHQB</urn2:code> </urn4:instructionForCreditorAgent> <urn4:chequeInstruction> <urn2:chequeType>BCHQ</urn2:chequeType> <urn2:deliveryMethod>MLCD</urn2:deliveryMethod> </urn4:chequeInstruction> </urn1:transaction> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Confirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader>\r <wsc:SourceApplication>EVRYCPS</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PAY</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>PAYSPaymentCreate</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>V1_9</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>831509007</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials></wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>4201</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit>\r <wsc:customerid>831509007</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:locale>NO</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>123.123.123.123</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item key="Agreementid" value="831509007"/>\r <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="BES"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:PaymentConfirmRequest>\r <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level-->\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <urn:transactionInput>\r <urn1:transactionId>${create#Response#declare namespace ns5='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v1_9'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v1_9'; //ns5:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns5:paymentResult[1]/ns2:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId>\r </urn:transactionInput>\r </urn:PaymentConfirmRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Status update failed for all matching payments. Ref. ResultCode of each StatusUpdateResults for details

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns3:PaymentConfirmResponse xmlns:ns8="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:nationalinformation-nor:v2_0" xmlns:ns7="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns6="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:ns5="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:common:v2_0" xmlns:ns3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:ns2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22"> <ns4:ResponseState> <ErrorCode>6600</ErrorCode> <Severity>2</Severity> <ComponentId>111</ComponentId> <Message>Status update failed for all matching payments. Ref. ResultCode of each StatusUpdateResults for details</Message> <LogSequence xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </ns4:ResponseState> <ns3:paymentStatusUpdateSummary> <ns2:paymentStatus>PROCESSING</ns2:paymentStatus> <ns2:errorCode>6594</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:severity>3</ns2:severity> <ns2:message>Illegal status to update</ns2:message> <ns2:numberOfTransactions>1</ns2:numberOfTransactions> </ns3:paymentStatusUpdateSummary> <ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns2:messageId>134074</ns2:messageId> <ns2:paymentInfoId>148590</ns2:paymentInfoId> <ns2:transactionId>173091</ns2:transactionId> <ns2:paymentStatus>PROCESSING</ns2:paymentStatus> <ns2:errorCode>6594</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:severity>3</ns2:severity> <ns2:message>Illegal status to update</ns2:message> <ns2:operationsArray>VIEW_PAYMENT</ns2:operationsArray> </ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> </ns3:PaymentConfirmResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: Approve
